Hey folks, thought Iâ€™d throw up a quick site trying to collate all the (sometimes useful) information we have about Darklord to help others.

About Darklord

Darklord is a MUD started by Mogwai and Foriz, a long time ago. In around 2004, the MUD went offline for several years. Now, Darklord is back!

You can connect using either a basic telnet client, or preferably a dedicated MUD client to: darklordmud.duckdns.org:5000

darklord is maintained by asgrim. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
